name: StarLight (itch) (OwlForged)
description:
Create the Solar Highway connecting the central HUB and surrounding planets. Use the generated Hyperlanes and Warp Routes to develop an efficient plan. Connect as many planets and stations. Connecting pathways to the central HUB will increase scoring!

 

Install Instructions:

  1. Download and unzip the file.
  2. Open / Double click "StarLight.exe"
  3. Create the Solar Highway!
